user.title: Connect to HA 3D Blueprint
user.description: Please enter the hostname of your HA 3D Blueprint add-on. This is usually 'local-blueprint-engine'.

sensors.title: Select Blueprint Sensors
sensors.description: Please select your stationary Bluetooth sensor entities and the single 'BLE Transmitter' sensor entity from your mobile phone.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the add-on. Please check the hostname and ensure the add-on is running.
